dc.title: Piping Plover Atlantic Coast Population, Northeast Region, U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service
dc.description: Piping plover (threatened) biology and management on the east coast, inlcuding the full recovery plan, current productivity data, and a slide show. From the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service.
